name: Friggy Adventure
description: Hi I am Rocker or my IRL name is Amal Salih, don't judge me and this is my first 2d game which I actually coded. Shoutout to CodingFlow for the Inspiration for this! He has amazing tutorials. Some code is "burrowed"from him.  But the other codes are by me. Yep,  his code was a lit bit outdated.  Just a bit, but I managed to fix them, causing them to be my code. I decided to name it after Zelda, so I named it lenda but since our mascot is Frigga frag, we have him in our name. Donating helps a lot! It's your choice to donate! It will help me make more levels and sequels! Currently working on a 3d shooter
